control.name: Implement functionality to terminate the session at the remote endpoint after a predefined period of inactivity
control.desc: In most popular frameworks, you can set the session timeout via configuration options. This parameter should be set according to the best practices specified in the framework documentation. The recommended timeout may be between 10 minutes and two hours, depending on the app's sensitivity.

reference.name: OWASP MASVS - Testing the Session Timeout

test.steps: Verify that sessions are terminated at the remote endpoint after a predefined period of inactivity.
